title: Increase test coverage from 46% to 80%
description: Current coverage gaps: config.rs (0%), template.rs (0%), main.rs (0%). Priority targets: config loading, template rendering, integration tests.

title: Skip copying unchanged static assets
description:
## Summary
- Detect unchanged static files during copy_static_files
- Avoid redundant disk writes for identical content

## Acceptance Criteria
- Static copy step checks metadata or hashes before copy
- Logging indicates when files are skipped vs copied
- Tests cover unchanged and changed asset flows

title: Stream markdown processing in parallel
description:
## Summary
- Stream markdown file discovery directly into Rayon processing
- Replace upfront Vec collection with parallel iterator bridge

## Acceptance Criteria
- main pipeline uses parallel bridge from WalkDir
- Memory usage measurable lower on large sites
- Benchmark or measurement documented in PR

title: Reuse cached template environment
description:
## Summary
- Reuse the global OnceLock-backed template Environment for single page renders
- Avoid rebuilding loaders per page to reduce CPU and I/O

## Acceptance Criteria
- render_html no longer constructs a fresh Environment per call
- Shared environment still supports template_dir overrides when config changes
- Tests cover template rendering after refactor
